posts.post_content: I love Dryad Arbor just because of how absurd it is. Sadly, I don't consider it to be all that useful. It uses up your land drop for the turn, and the fact that it's also a creature makes it much more vulnerable to removal. Dryad Arbor would be a lot more useful and fun if it didn't suffer from summoning sickness.
